summary.description:
Today, cooler for the outside temperature (down 2.7°C) and feels like temperature (down 2.5°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 8%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 635 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1585 m), light levels (up 2927 lux), feels like temperature (up 4.6°C), and outside temperature (up 4.4°C) when compared to today.

Today’s average cloud levels is 634.6m lower than yesterday, 543.2m lower than the past week, 1584.7m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, cloud levels hit a low of 1059m and a high of 3380m, averaging 1089.6m; the past week and month reported somewhat higher averages.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; the temperature will feel pleasantly warm. Also, extremely heavy humidity levels and very little to no wind will be present. Drizzle or light rain possible, partial cloudiness with some periods of sun, and moderate levels of sunlight will be present. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
